description: Aspose.Words for .NET class library supports DOC, DOCX, RTF, HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, XPS, EPUB and other formats. With Aspose.Words you can generate, modify, convert, render and print documents without utilizing Microsoft Word®
releaseNotes:
There are 159 improvements and fixes in this regular monthly release. The most notable are:

• Rendering to PostScript 3.0 is now supported
• Metafile rendering performance significantly improved
• EditableRange API introduced
• German ordinal/cardinal list label generation supported
• Improved tab width computation in marginal scenarios
• Improved table border rendering with conflicting or missing attributes

This release introduces the new features, enhancements and fixes to the excptions/bugs as detailed below:

• New features
WORDSNET-1067	/protection ranges/ Support protection of selected ranges in documents.
WORDSNET-1960	Add an option to resample images to size and resolution before writing to PDF
WORDSNET-2304	Consider adding an ability to remove style from the document.
WORDSNET-3995	Support rendering document to PostScript
WORDSNET-4252	Consider adding a property to Style class which shows if a Style is part of the Quick Styles gallery in a document
WORDSNET-4726	/protection ranges/ permStart/permEnd tags are lost during open/save DOCX and WML
WORDSNET-5998	Consider public API for removal of External Custom XML Schema References
WORDSNET-6196	Support German numbering localization
WORDSNET-6719	/protection ranges/ Header footer protection while document remains editable
WORDSNET-6905	Content controls become non-editable during open/save
WORDSNET-8389	Preserve protection of selected ranges upon DOC round-trip.
WORDSNET-8593	Document.Save do not preserve unprotected regions
WORDSNET-8594	Span width is not preserved during converting MHTML to Word
WORDSNET-8655	Add option to convert SVG to EMF instead of PNG in output Pdf file
WORDSNET-8765	Text moves to next line after conversion from Docx to Pdf
WORDSNET-8799	Render path gradient in SWF.
